mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(name, password, email, phone, create_time, modify_time, is_delete, is_active) VALUES (#{name},#{password},#{email}, #{phone}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{isDelete}, #{isActive})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, name, password, email, phone, create_time, modify_time, is_delete, is_active FROM user where name = #{name}
SELECT user_id, name, password, email, phone, create_time, modify_time, is_delete, is_active FROM user where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, create_time = #{createTime}, modify_time = #{modifyTime}, is_delete = #{isDelete}, is_active = #{isActive} where user_id = #{userId}
